features.description: Added launch screen.
Added What's New Screen.
Bug fixes.
Added macOS app.
Added watchOS app.
Brand new schedule tab on iPad.
Bringing brand new Home tab to iPad.
Bug fixes.
You will revieve an alert before deleting a task, assignment, exam, subject or a subject.
Fixed the bug that buttons might lead to blank screens on Apple TV.
Fiexd some typos across the app.
New Privacy Policy page.
Fixed the bug that user interface might exceed the screen on Apple TV.
ETA to school now automatically refreshes.
Notification features now are availiable on macOS app.
Redesigned home banner helps you easily track upcoming sessions, now it also displays a timer for ongoing sessions.
Redesigned home experience, now you can add subjects, tasks, assignments, and more right from the Home tab with brand new + button at bottom right corner.

New visual design levels up experiences. The new design language moves all action buttons to the bottom and save more viewing area to the top to make it easier to navigate within the app with one hand.
View currently enrolled sujects right from the Home tab with newly designed subject cards.
New animation when you tap and hold buttons.
The new Settings tab helps you navigate between different categories more easily.
Now you can check the weather condition of your school or current location right from Home Tab.
Ability to reset all data from the Settings tab.
View update history of past versions. In the Settings, you can also check if the app version is up to date.
The app size is up to 2/3 smaller than last version.
Added support to Apple Vision Pro (Under the development).
When you create a new session, the week day will be automatically chosen to current week day.
Redesigned filters options.
You can create new entries right from subject detail page, and the entry will be automatically selected to be associated with the subject.
Redesigned iPad experience, fully take advantage of larger screen.
Now you can add more detailed address information to exam and class location, and view them in map view.
Brand new Mental Wellbeing Tab with beautiful mesh background.
My School now is officially running natively on Apple Vision Pro.

New visual design for macOS app. Navigate within app with brand new tab bar floating on the top (show and hide the tab bar by clicking the blue dot at top left of the window. Settings Tab now also gets a new look.
Using Image Playground to generate attachments. (On Apple Intelligence supported devices only)
Customise Subjects with even more colour options.
View and manage your school on redesigned Apple Watch app, with more detailed pages for subjects, assignments, exams and more.

On supported Apple Watch, you can double pinch your fingers to quickly scroll between different pages/tabs, or in subject detail page, you can double pinch to easily go back to the first page. This becomes useful as we introduce more continuous and scrolling and viewing experience on Apple Watch app.
Redesigned Apple TV app let you use home TV as a dashboard, track upcoming sessions and the schedule of the whole week.
Now you are also able to add mental wellbeing entry for sessions from More button at bottom right in session detail page.
View and edit your mental wellbeing score and entries from Apple TV app.
View and download other apps to support the developer from new Settings page.
Bug fixes.
Added support for Chinese, Simplified and English(Australia).
Bug fixes.
Added support for Live Activity, track your current session right from Lock Screen, Dynamic Island and StandBy mode.
Bug fixes.
Now fully compatible with iOS 26, iPadOS 26, watchOS 26, visionOS 26, macOS 26, and tvOS 26.
Refreshed the user interface with a stunning new Liquid Glass design.
Dynamic gradient background on the Home tab that changes with the time of day.
Updated app icons to match the new Liquid Glass aesthetic.
Leveraging Apple Intelligence, My School can now summarise subject, assignment, and other entry descriptions — even offline.
Introducing AI Guide — a built-in assistant that offers intelligent tips, suggestions, and tailored guidance for your assignments and entries, powered by Apple Intelligence.
Live Activity support added — track your current session directly from the Lock Screen, Dynamic Island, and StandBy mode.
Set any location as your school directly from the map interface.
Customise the colour scheme in the macOS app.
Quickly check session status with the new tab bar accessory (iOS & iPadOS only).
Added support for quickly viewing session details on Apple TV.
New Mental Wellbeing feature offers insights and support suggestions based on your school activity.
General performance improvements and bug fixes.
Now fully compatible with iOS 26, iPadOS 26, watchOS 26, visionOS 26, macOS 26, and tvOS 26.
Refreshed the user interface with a stunning new Liquid Glass design.
Dynamic gradient background on the Home tab that changes with the time of day.
Updated app icons to match the new Liquid Glass aesthetic.
Leveraging Apple Intelligence, My School can now summarise subject, assignment, and other entry descriptions — even offline.
Introducing AI Guide — a built-in assistant that offers intelligent tips, suggestions, and tailored guidance for your assignments and entries, powered by Apple Intelligence.
Live Activity support added — track your current session directly from the Lock Screen, Dynamic Island, and StandBy mode.
Set any location as your school directly from the map interface.
Customise the colour scheme in the macOS app.
Added support for quickly viewing session details on Apple TV.
New Mental Wellbeing feature offers insights and support suggestions based on your school activity.
General performance improvements and bug fixes.
General performance improvements and bug fixes.
The Settings Page has been redesigned to have a clearer and more consistent appearance across all platforms.
All new Grading System allows you to choose and set preferred grading rule from 6 most used grading systems over the world with more to come in the future.
Migration Guide helps you upgrade your data to the lated framework.
New Apple Intelligence features help you understand your performance even better.
Apple Intelligence powered mental wellbeing suggestions make reflection easier like never before.
Redesigned Wellbeing tab makes it a better wellness center for recarding and discovering.
Introducing refreshed, compact design of the Home Tab Top Bar showing all the essential information at a glance, with details available in popovers.

More advanced search function allows you search subjects and entries via Spotlight right from home screen. With updated in-app search function, you can now easily find entries or subjects by search wider range of keywords.
Ability to convert entries to different categories.
New laguages have been added. My School now is in English, Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean and Spanish.
WAM calculator is added to your performance report.
Added Siri Shortcuts, now you can ask Siri about your next assignment, exam, and more.
Tapping on notifications now directs you to the detail page.
Now you can add weight to each entry's marks.
You can now add location information, attachments, and more to all kinds of entries.
Support new windowing system on iPadOS 26.
Now your persoal profile syncs across devices via iCloud.
More and refreshed Home Tab backgrounds.
Adding more pointer hovering effects for better mouse experience.
Various UI refinements for a cleaner, more consistent experience.
General performance improvements and bug fixes.
